description.description: Short description for the addon. It encourages user to click into the infoUrl to get more information.

website.description: Optional. The URL to the addon's website or documentation. It should be a valid URL.

sourceUrl.description: It should be either url to github repository or direct download link to the addon's zip file.

key.description: The key of the addon. It should be unique and defined same as in the addon's manifest file.

version.description: Optional. The newest version of the addon. Its used to compare with the installed version to check for updates.
